properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, '부서없음') DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE2 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT2 ON (DEPT_ID = DEPT_CODE) JOIN JOB2 USING(JOB_CODE) ORDER BY EMP_ID
INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE2 VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, NULL, DEFAULT)
